addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Company_Code: Select the company code from the dropdown.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Country: Select the country from the dropdown.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_State: Select the state from the dropdown.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_City: Select the city from the dropdown.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Save: Click here to save the plant.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Cancel: Click here to cancel and go back to the plant listing.
